original_title: All Star Comedy Jam: Live from South Beach
overview: Shaquille O'Neal turns up the heat for the second edition  of the All Star Comedy Jam, with the legendary D.L.  Hughley playing emcee and stand-up sharpshooters  Earthquake, Lavell Crawford, Melanie Comarcho and Arnez  J. topping the bill. Filmed at the Fillmore Miami Beach  as part of the 2009 American Black Film Festival, the  no-limits sketch revue taps the Original Kings of Comedy  vein and gets the funny on.
title: All Star Comedy Jam: Live from South Beach
